name.ja: <ruby>魔法妖精<rt>マジック・エルフ</rt></ruby> バーガンディ

text.en: If a card(s) is discarded from your opponent's hand by a card effect while you control this monster: You can inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each discarded card. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand. You can only use each effect of "Burgundy the Magic Elf" once per turn.
